snippet: This exhibition celebrates the centennial of the Great Migration and, just as significantly, reunites Jacob Lawrence’s paintings of this mass movement of African-Americans to the North.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews Museum of Modern Art exhibition One-Way Ticket: Jacob Lawrence’s Migration Series and Other Visions of the Great Movement North.
lead_paragraph: This exhibition celebrates the centennial of the Great Migration and, just as significantly, reunites Jacob Lawrence’s paintings of this mass movement of African-Americans to the North.

headline.main: Review: ‘One-Way Ticket’ at MoMA Reunites Jacob Lawrence’s Migration Paintings
headline.print_headline: Together Again to Tell Their Tale Whole
